Song.title: The Audience Of One
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook © 2002 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E]I have one [E/D]passion,{,} [C#m]one great delig[E/D]ht [E]One center [E/D]of my [A2 G6]life [E]To glori[E/D]fy Him{,} who [C#m7]bears the scars of gra[E/D]ce [E]And to walk wor[E/D]thy of His [A]name [G]For all my d[Bsus4 | Bsus4 |]ays
Chorus: With all my [A]heart and soul and [C#m]strength In ev’ry [A]word and thought and [E]deed I’ll live for [F#m]Him who died for [C#m]me To please the [A]Audience of [E]One How can I [A]not pledge all my [C#m]love In light of [A]all that He has [E]done? There is one [F#m]glory that I [C#m]seek To please the [A]Audience of [E | D | C#m | D |]One
Verse 2: [E]Let me seek on[E/D]e prize,{,} [C#m7]one great rewar[E/D]d [E]One hope I [E/D]treasure [A2 | G6 |]most [E]To hear the Fa[E/D]ther say,{,} [C#m7]“My child, well do[E/D]ne [E]Come enter in[E/D]to all the jo[A]y [G]Found in my [Bsus4 | Bsus4 |]Son”
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i have one passion one great delight one center of my life to glorify him who bears the scars of grace and to walk worthy of his name for all my days chorus with all my heart and soul and strength in evry word and thought and deed ill live for him who died for me to please the audience of one how can i not pledge all my love in light of all that he has done there is one glory that i seek to please the audience of one verse 2 let me seek one prize one great reward one hope i treasure most to hear the father say my child well done come enter into all the joy found in my son
